item.title:
RT by @dan_abramov: Maksym was at his job in an electronics store at a Kremenchuk shopping mall on Monday, serving customers buying air conditioners to combat the summer heat. Then a missile struck the mall.
My piece for @BBCWorld from Kremenchuk.
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-europe-61967376
item.dc:creator: @sophierose233
item.description:
Maksym was at his job in an electronics store at a Kremenchuk shopping mall on Monday, serving customers buying air conditioners to combat the summer heat. Then a missile struck the mall.

My piece for @BBCWorld from Kremenchuk.

bbc.co.uk/news/world-europe-‚Ä¶

item.title: R to @dan_abramov: it would be very helpful if you could create a little codesandbox demonstrating what you‚Äôre trying to do in practice. putting something from url into state is always suspicious because what should happen when the user presses Back? you‚Äôd want to respond to that.
item.dc:creator: @dan_abramov
item.description: it would be very helpful if you could create a little codesandbox demonstrating what you‚Äôre trying to do in practice. putting something from url into state is always suspicious because what should happen when the user presses Back? you‚Äôd want to respond to that.
